name: Defend The Dice
description:
Make sure to watch the Trailer for story-line :) 

A game about being exiled, finding an awkward friend, and protecting the dice;

A cinematic experience, game, original music; its all in one ride.

Its more than a game, its an indie experience.

Creators:
Danish Asif

Osama Sarfaraz

Talal Fahim

Usman Bukhari

Any donations will be accepted as we plan on making a game studio together :)

Game Controls.

Arrow Keys to Move

Space to Roll Dice (you can move upto the number of spaces the dice has rolled)
